dmca.title: Immediate Removal of Dave Ramsey Podcast
dmca.body:
Subject: Immediate Removal of Dave Ramsey Podcast
From:    "Tim Smith" <tims@daveramsey.com>
Date:    Mon, October 24, 2005 9:41 am
To:      partnerships@loomia.com
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

To Whom It May Concern:

The Lampo Group, Inc. is requesting you immediately remove the 3-hour
Podcast of The Dave Ramsey Show from your website.

The link can be found here:
http://www.loomia.com/media/feed?cp=/44174&hd=/01/0082

The Dave Ramsey Show podcast is a commercially-licensed product and is
copyright protected.  Posting links to the podcast is an infringement
upon these rights.

We appreciate a quick response in this matter.

We offer a free one-hour podcast of The Dave Ramsey Show that can be
posted on any site.  The new link is below:
http://www.daveramsey.com/media/audio/podcast/podcast.xml
<http://www.daveramsey.com/media/audio/podcast/podcast.xml>

Please confirm that this email message has been received to prevent
further action.

Tim Smith
tims@daveramsey.com <mailto:tims@daveramsey.com>
eBusiness Department
The Dave Ramsey Show
615.371.8881 x161

www.daveramsey.com
